title: Smart ATS Resume Builder
description: A Smart ATS-friendly resume builder designed to generate optimized resumes for applicant tracking systems. The tool applies best practices for resume formatting and content to improve visibility in automated hiring pipelines.

creators.name: Daakshayani N S
creators.affiliation: Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India

notes: This automated ATS-optimized resume builder is published for academic and educational purposes and archived on Zenodo for citation.
